detailsData.title: 25 Years Experience
detailsData.content: At The Law Offices of Dianne Sawaya, our Denver personal injury attorneys have represented thousands of clients over the years, supported by our highly professional and efficient staff.

detailsData.title: Personalized Services
detailsData.content: Our team of Denver personal injury attorneys provides personalized services for each client who has been seriously injured. We maintain constant communication–we’ll be with you each step of the way.

detailsData.title: Compassionate Approach
detailsData.content: We take a personal, compassionate approach to personal injury law–we work only for you and your family–not for insurance companies or big corporations. Doctors and other professionals trust us to help.

detailsData.title: Maximized Settlement
detailsData.content: We fight the insurance companies so that you can focus on getting healthy after an accident. Contact us 24/7 for a Free Consultation to see how we can help.

address: 4500 Cherry Creek South Drive, Suite 1030 Denver, Colorado 80246
valueProp: At The Law Offices of Dianne Sawaya, our Denver personal injury attorneys have represented thousands of clients over the years, supported by our highly professional and efficient staff. When we take your case, you are our priority. We fight the insurance companies so that you can focus on getting healthy after an accident.
CTA: GET YOUR FREE CASE REVIEW  SERVING ALL OF COLORADO

testimonalData.text: From start to finish I had a great experience. The insurance company tried to offer me a pittance to settle my claim. The would not listen to me – but they sure listened to Dianne!
testimonalData.author: Aurora H.
